job_tasks.phrase: Je draagt bij aan de strategische doelstellingen en hebt een directe impact op de data-gedreven besluitvorming binnen de organisatie.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the role's alignment with organizational strategy and its impact on business decisions.

job_tasks.phrase: richt zich op geavanceerde analytics, inclusief Data Science, Deep Learning en Generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions key areas of AI modeling, including Generative AI.
This explicitly states the development of applications based on Generative AI models.
Implementing applications falls under software development.
Setting up cloud environments is a core part of software development for cloud-based applications.

job_tasks.phrase: werken aan zowel de backend als de frontend
job_tasks.justification: Working on both backend and frontend are traditional software development tasks.
Mentioning Agile/DevOps culture implies practices related to operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt samen met een team van professionals
richt zich op geavanceerde analytics, inclusief Data Science, Deep Learning en Generative AI

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes the development of Generative AI applications and focuses on implementing AI applications. While it mentions 'Full Stack Developer AI with Cloud Expertise', the core AI responsibilities lean towards building and implementing AI solutions rather than purely predictive modeling or operations.
